text.div:
MessageTransport

The protocol used for message transport.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/message-transport defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
http HTTP The application sends or receives messages using HTTP POST (may be over http: or https:).
ftp FTP The application sends or receives messages using File Transfer Protocol.
mllp MLLP The application sends or receives messages using HL7's Minimal Lower Level Protocol.

name: MessageTransport
description: The protocol used for message transport.

concept.definition: The application sends or receives messages using HTTP POST (may be over http: or https:).
The application sends or receives messages using File Transfer Protocol.
The application sends or receives messages using HL7's Minimal Lower Level Protocol.
